sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop will conduct TB VI Stryker Gunnery IVO RG 204 NLT 19FEB IOT Certify Bull Troop Vehicle Crews For Future Training.
Bull Troop Gunnery TBL VI RG 204 BSS
COMMANDERS
sections.PURPOSE: Qualifying all 1/2CR Stryker crews through gunnery table VI sets conditions for collective training on our glidepath to Saber Junction 25 and maintains our readiness for war.
sections.END STATE: 1/2CR crews are qualified through Table VI IAW TC 3-20.o (IWTS) in preparation for collective live fires in FY25.
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
Trucks arrive from RNG 301
Day and Night Iterations Conducted
1st and 2nd Complete concurrent dismounted training
Range Handover to RES completed
